name: Project E.1337 (Feature Film)
blurb: Genetically enhanced test subjects are sent out on a suicide mission to see if they come back alive!

name: Bringing Back Wildlife Programming! Join Us On This Journey!
blurb: Remember when TV had positive and educational wildlife shows? Join me and my film crew as we bring them back with excitement!

name: Day of Reckoning
blurb: A short film about a woman who takes matters of justice into her own hands, and in the process, starts down a very different path...

name: Högt Spel - High Stakes
blurb: A 20 minutes homage to the genre Action. Made by teens that loves movies! A project with the focus of having the time of their lives!

name: KUNG FURY
blurb:
Kung Fury is a visually spectacular action comedy that
has its foundation in 80s cop movies.

name: Reign of Judges: Title of Liberty (Concept Film Short)
blurb: Reign of Judges: Title of Liberty is a fan-driven beginning… to the epic New World saga of love, war, revolution, and freedom.

name: "Shrouded Destiny: A Star Wars Long Tale" - Pilot Episode
blurb: A pilot episode set in the Star Wars Universe more than 500 years before the Star Wars Luke Skywalker Episodes.

name: The Righteous Twelve
blurb: IN THEATERS SUMMER OF 2020 - "No Man Can Escape God's Wrath" - From the Filmmakers of "Shake Off The World" & "Amazed By You"

name: Fund Our FULL FEATURE "Reign of Judges: Title of Liberty"!
blurb: A period action film, like Braveheart, but set in the 73 BC pre-Columbian New World. The first North American, pre-Columbian war epic.

name: SPIDER-MAN 4 - A Fan Film Sequel to the Spider-Man Trilogy!
blurb: A fan created continuation of the phenomenal Sam Raimi Spider-Man Trilogy! based on leaked plot details of the cancelled Spider-Man 4!

name: PIZZA TIME: An Action-Comedy Short
blurb: A pizza delivery driver goes to the right place at the wrong time when he stumbles into the scene of a hitman's contract killing.

name: White Spot - places you never thought exist
blurb: Be sure that this is not "another" travel-film. Come with us on a journey of deep cave rappelling, denied visas and above 6000m.

name: "Find Yourself a Pretty Penny" - A Cowboy Western Short Film
blurb: A gory western film, action-packed with stealth, shootouts, and showdowns.

name: Missing, Murdered, Indigenous Women Film.
blurb: A sex-trafficking ring near the reservation kidnaps a girl. The boyfriend finds himself with no choice but to save her all by himself.

name: Dirty Rotten Tofu and the Gohan Girls: A Short Western
blurb: In the Wild West, three Asian girls fight for their freedom from Tofu, a Chinatown crime boss who wants them back, “Dead or Alive.”

name: My Friend | Short WWII Film (2022)
blurb: A short film about a WWII German soldier who lays down arms to help a British soldier return safely to his base and get back home

name: Supply Run | A high-stakes international travel reality show
blurb: Season 01's mission: a team of 4 must acquire and deliver a list of crucial items to a remote community deep in the Indian Himalayas

name: "Light Of Moran" - A Power Rangers Fan Film
blurb: "Light Of Moran: A Megaforce Story" is an unofficial prequel fan film to Power Rangers Megaforce, re-imagining the story of Gia Moran.
